name: Grand Escape (itch)
description:
A 2D endless platformer game made with Unity Engine

How to Play: Press[Space] to change gravity, pick up computer chips and run as far as you can.

Author:

Nauval Muhammad Firdaus - 2301906331

LB04 (Small Class) / MA04( (Big Class)

Course: Game Programming (GAME6069)

The game may load for several seconds. If you have any problem, you can play the executable version by accessing this link.
